comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: White House wedding of the President's daughter, Jessie Woodrow Wilson, to Francis Bowes Sayre.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Wystan:

Thanks for your information here and on all the other images related to this day at the White House. We will add information to each record when we update.
